prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a tough, armored creature with spikes and a determined expression.
Imagine a blue Pokemon with a round body, sharp edges, and a lively personality, perfect for battles.
Show me a medium-sized Pokemon with a rocky exterior and a playful demeanor that likes to hide in caves.
Generate a powerful creature with a spiky design, combining shades of gray and blue for a fierce look.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, showcasing its strength and resilience against opponents.
Give me a Pokemon that evolves from a small, cute creature into a formidable warrior with a rocky appearance.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique blend of colors, with an emphasis on gray and blue tones, perfect for urban settings.
